ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Junior Developer in apprenticeship
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Currently in my 3rd year of a Computer Science Bachelor's degree (BUT Informatique) in Clermont-Ferrand, I am working as an apprentice at CGI for the client Michelin. I will continue my studies at the ISIMA engineering school after completing my degree.
ABOUT.MORE: Passionate about networking and development, I am always eager to discover new programming approaches and technologies. I have developed several projects with Flutter, as well as many APIs using PHP Slim. During my apprenticeship, I am working on a Spring Boot microservice, which allows me to strengthen my Java skills.
